openGraph.title: Premium Senior Home Care Website Design & Development | Compassionate Care
openGraph.description: Transform your senior home care business with our specialized web development services. Attract more clients, streamline care coordination, and establish trust in your local community.

questions.name: How long does it take to build a senior home care website?
questions.answer: Typically 4-6 weeks from strategy session to launch. This includes design, development, content creation, and testing. Complex integrations with care management systems may extend this timeline.

questions.name: Do you work with senior care providers outside Europe?
questions.answer: We specialize exclusively in European senior care providers to ensure deep understanding of GDPR, healthcare regulations, and other regional compliance requirements.

questions.name: What ROI can I expect?
questions.answer: Most clients see 150-250% increase in qualified care inquiries within 90 days. Our average client recovers their investment within 3-6 months through increased client acquisition and improved care coordination.

questions.name: Do you offer ongoing support?
questions.answer: Yes, all packages include ongoing support. We also offer monthly optimization packages to ensure your website continues to perform and adapt to healthcare regulation changes.

questions.name: Can you integrate with my existing care management system?
questions.answer: We integrate with most major care management systems including ClearCare, AlayaCare, and others. Custom integrations are available for specialized systems.

questions.name: What happens after the website launches?
questions.answer: We provide comprehensive training for your team, ongoing performance monitoring, and continuous optimization. You'll have a dedicated account manager for support.
